Choose the e-register provider depending on which one your school uses. You'll be able to set up more student accounts and e-registers later as needed.
Some login credentials may be stored by the e-register service provider, either encoded or as tokens. This data is not shared and will never leave your device for purposes other than logging in.

These are your e-register accounts. Choose one of the currently logged-in sessions, or go create a new one.
